verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Song, a Psalm. Make a joyful noise <S%H7321><s%> unto God <S%H430><s%>, all the earth <S%H776><s%>:
Sing forth <S%H2167><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of his name <S%H8034><s%>: Make <S%H7760><s%> his praise <S%H8416><s%> glorious <S%H3519><s%>.

Say <S%H559><s%> unto God <S%H430><s%>, How terrible <S%H3372><s%> are thy works <S%H4639><s%>! Through the greatness <S%H7230><s%> of thy power <S%H5797><s%> shall thine enemies <S%H341><s%> submit themselves unto thee <S%H3584><s%>.
All the earth <S%H776><s%> shall worship <S%H7812><s%> thee <S%H2167><s%>, And shall sing unto thee <S%H2167><s%>; They shall sing to thy name <S%H8034><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
Come <S%H3212><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%> the works <S%H4659><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>; He is terrible <S%H3372><s%> in his doing <S%H5949><s%> toward the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>.
He turned <S%H2015><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> into dry <S%H3004><s%> land <S%H5674><s%>; They went through the river <S%H5104><s%> on foot <S%H7272><s%>: There did we rejoice in him <S%H8055><s%>.

He ruleth <S%H4910><s%> by his might <S%H1369><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>; His eyes <S%H5869><s%> observe <S%H6822><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%>: Let not the rebellious <S%H5637><s%> exalt <S%H7311><s%> themselves <S%H5542><s%>. [[Selah
Oh bless <S%H1288><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, ye peoples <S%H5971><s%>, And make the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his praise <S%H8416><s%> to be heard <S%H8085><s%>;
Who holdeth <S%H7760><s%> our soul <S%H5315><s%> in life <S%H2416><s%>, And suffereth <S%H5414><s%> not our feet <S%H7272><s%> to be moved <S%H4132><s%>.
For thou <S%H430><s%>, O God, hast proved <S%H974><s%> us <S%H6884><s%>: Thou hast tried us <S%H3701><s%>, as silver is tried <S%H6884><s%>.
Thou broughtest <S%H935><s%> us into the net <S%H4686><s%>; Thou layedst <S%H7760><s%> a sore burden <S%H4157><s%> upon our loins <S%H4975><s%>.

Thou didst cause men <S%H582><s%> to ride <S%H7392><s%> over our heads <S%H7218><s%>; We went <S%H935><s%> through fire <S%H784><s%> and through water <S%H4325><s%>; But thou broughtest us out <S%H3318><s%> into a wealthy place <S%H7310><s%>.
I will come <S%H935><s%> into thy house <S%H1004><s%> with burnt-offerings <S%H5930><s%>; I will pay <S%H7999><s%> thee my vows <S%H5088><s%>,
Which my lips <S%H8193><s%> uttered <S%H6475><s%>, And my mouth <S%H6310><s%> spake <S%H6475><s%>, when I was in distress <S%H6862><s%>.

I will offer <S%H5927><s%> unto thee burnt-offerings <S%H5930><s%> of fatlings <S%H4220><s%>, With the incense <S%H7004><s%> of rams <S%H352><s%>; I will offer <S%H6213><s%> bullocks <S%H1241><s%> with goats <S%H6260><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
Come <S%H3212><s%>, and hear <S%H8085><s%>, all ye that fear <S%H3373><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, And I will declare <S%H5608><s%> what he hath done <S%H6213><s%> for my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
I cried <S%H7121><s%> unto him with my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, And he was extolled <S%H7311><s%> with <S%H8478><s%> my tongue <S%H3956><s%>.
If I regard <S%H7200><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%> in my heart <S%H3820><s%>, The Lord <S%H136><s%> will not hear <S%H8085><s%>:
But verily <S%H403><s%> God <S%H430><s%> hath heard <S%H8085><s%>; He hath attended <S%H7181><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my prayer <S%H8605><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be God <S%H430><s%>, Who hath not turned away <S%H5493><s%> my prayer <S%H8605><s%>, Nor his lovingkindness from me <S%H2617><s%>.
